technicalEvents.title: Paper Presentation
technicalEvents.description: A 24-hour coding marathon where teams compete to build innovative solutions to real-world problems. Showcase your coding skills and creativity in this intense competition.
rules: Teams of 2-4 members
All code must be written during the event
Use of open-source libraries is permitted
Final projects must be submitted by the deadline
Judging based on innovation, functionality, and presentation

technicalEvents.title: Project Presentation
technicalEvents.description: Design and develop a fully functional website based on the given theme within the time limit. Show off your front-end and back-end skills.
rules: Individual participation
Frameworks and libraries allowed
Website must be responsive
Time limit: 6 hours
Judging based on design, functionality, and code quality

technicalIndividualEvents.title: Code Debugging
technicalIndividualEvents.description: Learn about the latest advancements in AI and machine learning, then apply your knowledge in a competition to solve real-world problems using AI techniques.
rules: Teams of 1-3 members
Workshop attendance is mandatory for competition participation
Pre-trained models are allowed
Solutions must be original and ethical
Judging based on accuracy, innovation, and practical application

technicalIndividualEvents.title: Blind Coding
technicalIndividualEvents.description: Learn about the latest advancements in AI and machine learning, then apply your knowledge in a competition to solve real-world problems using AI techniques.
rules: Teams of 1-3 members
Workshop attendance is mandatory for competition participation
Pre-trained models are allowed
Solutions must be original and ethical
Judging based on accuracy, innovation, and practical application

technicalIndividualEvents.description: Learn about the latest advancements in AI and machine learning, then apply your knowledge in a competition to solve real-world problems using AI techniques.
rules: Teams of 1-3 members

nonTechnicalEvents.title: Meme Contest
nonTechnicalEvents.description: A celebration of diverse cultures through music, dance, and performances. Showcase your talents and enjoy a night of entertainment.
rules: Group or individual performances
Maximum time limit: 10 minutes per performance
Pre-registration required
Props and costumes allowed
Judging based on creativity, skill, and audience engagement

nonTechnicalEvents.title: Photography
nonTechnicalEvents.description: Express your views and opinions on contemporary topics. Develop your public speaking and critical thinking skills.
rules: Teams of 2 members
Topics will be announced 1 hour before the event
Each team gets 5 minutes for presentation and 2 minutes for rebuttal
English and Hindi languages allowed
Judging based on content, delivery, and rebuttals

culturals.title: Cultural Show
culturals.description: A celebration of diverse cultures through music, dance, and performances. Showcase your talents and enjoy a night of entertainment.
